summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 40 Foley Square. The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Damian Williams.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which testimony is being compelled.

persons.name: Damian Williams
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear in court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 318, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on November 15, 2021, compelling an individual to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (20 Cr. 330).
The testimony was scheduled for November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.
The subpoena was issued and signed by U.S. Attorney Damian Williams.
Failure to comply with the subpoena would constitute contempt of court and subject the recipient to civil and criminal penalties.
